title: My quick thoughts on the new client
body:
Things I like:

* Able to rearrange mastery pages

* Downloading matches

* Able to edit in-game settings from client

* Practice tool (could use some more features but good so far)

* No longer returns to home page if a match is declined/not accepted

Things I dislike:

* Going to the collections page & viewing the champion info takes a lot of internet data! (I've noticed that one cycle through the videos of each champ uses up 60mb)

* Not being able to minimize the friends list

* Too fancy/slow; It'd be nice if there was an option to not load images (or something like that) 

* Random animation bugs in-game (e.g. Amumu ult animation remaining on map after being used)

- A lot less profile info & no item sets 
- Large game folder size (went up to over 10gb from 6gb)
- Having to reinstall every few weeks
